div.p: This case-sensitive code system https://fhir.nhs.uk/England/CodeSystem/FGM-ConsentPurpose defines the following code:

tr.td: FGM - Consent to record FGM flags

description.value: A CodeSystem to identify the purpose of the consent given within FGM
